info.title: Storyblocks API
info.description: The Storyblocks API provides access to our entire library of media and related utilities.

get.description: Get a list of video categories. Categories are returned as an array of Category objects.
Get a list of audio categories
Get a list of image categories
Get a list of video collections

num_items.description: Number of stock items in the collection

date_added.description: Date and time the collection was added

date_updated.description: Date and time the collection was last updated

post.description: If your YouTube channel ID is up to date and your claim was not automatically resolved in less than 30 minutes, we can still help you! By filing a dispute form we are able to remove 95% of outstanding copyright claims in less than 72 hours.

parameters.name: disputer_name
parameters.description: The name of the user who is filing the dispute.

parameters.name: disputed_url
parameters.description: The full url of the disputed video. The url must begin with 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?'.

parameters.name: disputer_email
parameters.description: The email of the user who is filing the dispute.

parameters.name: claimant_name
parameters.description: The name of the claimant filing the copyright claim. If the name of the claimant you want to provide is not in the following list, please email your account manager. Possible values include AdRev, AdRev for a 3rd party, AdRev for Rights Holder , AdRev Publishing, AdShare, AdShare for a 3rd party, AdShare MG, AdShare TV, APM, Audiam, AudioSparx, BeatStars, Believe Digital, Bongo BD, Catapult Distribution, Catch 22, CD Baby, Chicago Music Library, Clanger Digital, Clanger Rights, Colonize Media, Dance all Day, Daredo GmbH digedo, DigiSay, Facebook, Gene Michael Productions, Getty Images Music, GMA Network, Inc., HAAWK, Harry Fox Agency, HexaCorp LTD, HorusMusic, IdiomMusic, IDOL Distribution [Merlin], IndieTracks, InDMusic/Live Nation, INgrooves, Instagram, Intermède Music, IODA Music, John Hobart, Just Entertainment (justente), Kontor New Media, Label Worx, Live Nation Video Network, Merlin, Muserk, Naxos of America, NeilCross, ONErpm, Orfium Music, Other, Position Music, Renderyard, Rock Ridge Music, Route Note, Royal Supreme, Rumblefish, ScaleLab, Shemaroo, SmashTrax, SME (Sony Music Entertainment), Source Audio, Spinnin’ Records, Telepictures Music, The Orchard, Thoughtful Media, Triple Scoop Music, TuneCore, UMG, Vydia, Warner Chappell (WMG), and WM Music.

parameters.name: stock_item_id
parameters.description: The id of the audio stock item which is the subject of the copyright claim.

get.description: This endpoint returns all video stock items that will be expiring within the next 12 months. Once expired, this content is no longer available for download. This endpoint returns stock items in batches of 1000. If the response you receive indicates more items exist, the page parameter can be used to fetch the next set of 1000.

results_per_page.description: Number of stock items returned on this page

expiring_items.description: Array of stock item ids and their expirations

get.description: This endpoint returns all audio stock items that will be expiring within the next 12 months. Once expired, this content is no longer available for download. This endpoint returns stock items in batches of 1000. If the response you receive indicates more items exist, the page parameter can be used to fetch the next set of 1000.

results_per_page.description: Number of stock items returned on this page

expiring_items.description: Array of stock item ids and their expirations

get.description: This endpoint returns all image stock items that will be expiring within the next 12 months. Once expired, this content is no longer available for download. This endpoint returns stock items in batches of 1000. If the response you receive indicates more items exist, the page parameter can be used to fetch the next set of 1000.

results_per_page.description: Number of stock items returned on this page

expiring_items.description: Array of stock item ids and their expirations

get.description: List the details of your custom libraries

parameters.name: library_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the specific custom libraries you want details for. Without this specified, all custom libraries you have access to will be returned

date_added.description: When the library was created in Unix timestamp

last_updated.description: When the library was last updated in Unix timestamp

num_items.description: The number of stock items in the library

is_blacklist.description: Whether the library is a blacklist library

get.description: Search for video stock items. Filter the results using any of available query parameters listed below. Note that there is a limit of 10k search results returned for any search.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Filter by general content type. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include footage, motionbackgrounds, templates, and all. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: quality
parameters.description: Filter videos by quality available. Possible values include HD, 4K, and ALL. Defaults to ALL.

parameters.name: has_alpha
parameters.description: Search for content that has an alpha layer.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Get additional attributes for each stock item in your search results. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include download_formats, keywords, isSensitiveContent, categories, description, isEditorial, isStereo, hasAudio, hasAlpha, maxResolution, aspectRatio, durationMs

parameters.name: frame_rates
parameters.description: Filter by frame rate. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include 24, 25, 30, 50, 60.

results.description: Array of stock items returned by search

type.description: Content type for the stock item.

thumbnail_url.description: Url to download a small thumbnail of the stock item

preview_urls.description: Url to download a watermarked preview of the stock item

_180p.description: Url for preview file at 180p resolution

_360p.description: Url for preview file at 360p resolution

_480p.description: Url for preview file at 480p resolution

_720p.description: Url for preview file at 720p resolution

duration.description: Duration of video clip in seconds.

is_new.description: The stock item has been added in the last 90 days

get.description: Search for many audio stock items. Filter the results using any of available query parameters listed below. Note that there is a limit of 10k search results returned for any search.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Filter by general content type. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include music, sfx, and all. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: min_bpm
parameters.description: Search for content with a bpm (beats per minute) of at least this value. Only applies if the content_type is music.

parameters.name: max_bpm
parameters.description: Search for content with a bpm (beats per minute) of at most this value. Only applies if the content_type is music.

parameters.name: has_vocals
parameters.description: Search for content that has a vocal aspect.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Get additional attributes for each stock item in your search results. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include download_formats, keywords, isSensitiveContent, bpm, moods, genres, instruments, soundEffects, durationMs

results.description: Array of stock items returned by search

type.description: Content type for the stock item

thumbnail_url.description: Url to download a small thumbnail of a waveform representation of the stock item

preview_url.description: Url to download a preview of the stock item

duration.description: Duration of audio clip in seconds

bpm.description: Bpm (beats per minute) of audio clip

is_new.description: The stock item has been added in the last 90 days

get.description: Search for many image stock items. Filter the results using any of available query parameters listed below. Note that there is a limit of 10k search results returned for any search.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Filter by general content type. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include photos, illustrations, vectors, and all. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: Filter by image orientation. Possible values include portrait, square, landscape, and all. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: A 6 character hexadecimal value of a color (e.g.​ ​#BADA55)​. When provided, only content that has the provided color will be included.

parameters.name: has_transparency
parameters.description: Search for content that explicitly does or does not have an alpha channel. Content with an alpha channel is considered to have transparency.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Get additional attributes for each stock item in your search results. Multiple can be provided as a comma separated list. Possible values include download_formats, keywords, isSensitiveContent, categories, description, isEditorial, aspectRatio, colors

results.description: Array of stock items returned by search

type.description: Content type for the stock item

thumbnail_url.description: Url to download a small thumbnail of the stock item

preview_url.description: Url to download a preview of the stock item

is_new.description: The stock item has been added in the last 90 days

_720p.description: Url for preview file at 720p resolution

post.description: Update your YouTube Channel ID and we should be able to remove most claims automatically in less than 30 minutes with no further action required by you! Need help finding your YouTube channel ID? Please click here.

parameters.name: youtube_channel_id
parameters.description: Channel id to whitelist

content_type.description: The category can be used to filter stock items of this content type
The category can be used to filter stock items of this content type

category_group.description: The category is applied to this filter when searching for stock items

errors.description: This message will provide details of the missing or incorrect query parameter

example.errors: This message will provide details of the missing or incorrect query parameter

errors.description: This message will provide details of the failed authentication

example.errors: This message will provide details of the failed authentication

errors.description: This message will provide details about which entity is not found

example.errors: This message will provide details about which entity is not found

stock_item_id.name: stock_item_id
stock_item_id.description: Unique identifier for the stock item

APIKEY.name: APIKEY
APIKEY.description: Your public key should be used for this parameter

EXPIRES.name: EXPIRES
EXPIRES.description: An expiration time in seconds since the Unix epoch (January 1,1970). Need help?

HMAC.name: HMAC
HMAC.description: Your authentication code generated using the SHA-256 hmac algorithm with your private key and expires timestamp as the key and the requested resource as the data. HMAC should be provided in hexadecimal.

project_id.name: project_id
project_id.description: A unique identifier for the project within which this request is initiated

user_id.name: user_id
user_id.description: A unique identifier for the end user initiating this request

keywords.name: keywords
keywords.description: Search for content matching these keywords. Multiple values can be separated with a comma.

page.name: page
page.description: Request a specific page of content in a large set of results. Defaults to 1.

results_per_page.name: results_per_page
results_per_page.description: Receive this many stock items in one page of results. Defaults to 20. Note that results_per_page cannot exceed 500 and page * results_per_page cannot exceed 10,000.

sort_by.name: sort_by
sort_by.description: Sort results by internal metrics. Possible values include most_relevant, most_downloaded, highest_rated, most_recent, trending_now, and undiscovered. Defaults to most_relevant.

sort_order.name: sort_order
sort_order.description: Change the order of results you receive. Possible values include ASC and DESC.

required_keywords.name: required_keywords
required_keywords.description: Content must match all of these comma separated keywords.

filtered_keywords.name: filtered_keywords
filtered_keywords.description: Content must not match any of these comman separated keywords.

translate.name: translate
translate.description: Translate the search results. When using this parameter, the source_language parameter must be provided as well. Contact us to learn more about this feature.

source_language.name: source_language
source_language.description: Translate the search results into this language (specified as ISO language code). The translate parameter must be provided. Contact us to learn more about this feature.

contributor_id.name: contributor_id
contributor_id.description: Search for content uploaded by a specific contributor. Reach out to contributor@storyblocks.com to get your contributor id.

is_vr_360.name: is_vr_360
is_vr_360.description: Include or exclude VR / 360° content from your footage searches.

library_ids.name: library_ids
library_ids.description: Search for content belonging to a comma separated list of custom library ids.

exclude_library_ids.name: exclude_library_ids
exclude_library_ids.description: Search for content that does not belong to a comma separated list of custom library ids.

content_scores.name: content_scores
content_scores.description: Get content scores returned for each search result.

categories.name: categories
categories.description: Search for content belonging to these comma separated category ids. The category ids can be found using the Categories endpoint. Be sure to pass the apporpriate content_type for these categories as returned by the Categories endpoint.

has_talent_released.name: has_talent_released
has_talent_released.description: Search for content that explicitly has or does not have a Talent Release form on file.

has_property_released.name: has_property_released
has_property_released.description: Search for content that explicitly has or does not have a Property Release form on file.

is_editorial.name: is_editorial
is_editorial.description: Search for content that has been been flagged for editorial use.

min_duration.name: min_duration
min_duration.description: Search for content with a duration of at least this value in seconds.

max_duration.name: max_duration
max_duration.description: Search for content with a duration of at most this value in seconds.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of items you want returned. Defaults to 8 and has a max value of 500

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: Get a list of categories for each media type. Categories can help you or your end-users easily browse through and filter search results.

tags.name: Collections
tags.description: Our content experts hand-curate collections and playlists to make finding content easy for end-users. For each media type, use the two associated endpoints to deliver these collections to end-users. The first endpoint returns a list of available collections. The second endpoint returns the assets within a specific collection.

tags.name: Expiring Content
tags.description: There are instances where content is removed by our library (e.g. contributing artist decides to remove it). As a courtesy to our partners, we allow that content to be downloaded for 12 months following the removal date. This allows users who already have the removed content in a project to retain access to download quality assets until the project is exported.

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Search for stock assets from our library. Filter by using the dozens of query parameters listed below to narrow your results.

tags.name: Details
tags.description: For a specific asset, get detailed information specific to its media type along with its available download options.

tags.name: Similar Stock Items
tags.description: Have you found a stock item that's *almost* a perfect fit? Find more assets that have been used for similar purposes.
